tool_description: The Axesso Asos Data Service API returns detailed Asos product information including product title, manufacturer, reviews, price and more. Currently we support de, co.uk and us marketplaces. Find further information in our documentation http://api-doc.axesso.de/.
name: Axesso - Asos Data Service
title: Axesso - Asos Data Service

required_parameters.name: domainCode
required_parameters.description: Store / country. Valid values are `us` and `de`.

api_list.description: Fetch product details information by URL
